mapper.update: CREATE TABLE team_member_#{teamId} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_join_date DATETIME NOT NULL, team_manager BIGINT NOT NULL, users_id BIGINT NOT NULL UNIQUE, team_id BIGINT NOT NULL );
mapper.select: SELECT tm.id as id, tm.team_manager as teamManager, tm.users_id as userId, tm.team_id as teamId, u.name as name, u.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl, u.preferred_city as preferredCity, u.preferred_area as preferredArea FROM team_member_#{teamId} tm JOIN users u ON tm.users_id = u.id WHERE tm.team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_member_#{teamId} (user_join_date, team_manager, team_id, users_id) VALUES (now(), #{teamManager}, #{teamId}, #{userId})
